name: Color Jump Heroes
description:
The game about tiny color heroes. This guys loves jumping, so make them happy. You can upgrade, switch or open new colors in your color labaratory. Collect different colors in gameplay and open new colorful heroes in your lab. 

Gameplay explanation:
Color heroes always jumps, if you tap to screen your hero fastly moves down, this way you can avoid enemy color obstacles or collect crystals.

This is hardcore, addictive game with simple to play but hard to master gameplay. You can check other jumper's scores in the leaderboards and compete with them. I'm too here my nick is "BreakingUFO" let see, can you beat the developer :)

This game developed by one person with very limited resources, so please if you find any bug or error, just let me know about problem and I will do my best to fix that.

I'm planning to add more colors. Each new color brings to game new Hero and unique Enemy. So stay tuned :D

Please feel free to review and left comment if you have any ideas os thoughts about any aspects of the game, your opinion is very interesting to me. Let's make this game great toghether!
